All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Align
A SingleChildParent which aligns its single child within itself
Alignment
Represents the alignment of an object relative to another
Animation
Animation holds a value which increments from 0 to 1 over some duration.
Animation.RepeatMode
Indicates how an animation behaves when it reaches its end
Animation.State
Constants for the state of an Animation
AnimationCurve
Animation curves transforms an Animation value from a (0 - 1) range to a point on a curve equation defined in AnimationCurve.get(double) method.
Application
Application is the heart of a GameKit program.
Blend
An abstract composite which blends source and destination colors in a way to produce the final pixel color.
Bounds
Represents a render bound on the screen in which a Widget is rendered
Button
A Widget which can be clicked to trigger an event
Camera
Camera controls which part of the game world is visible in the Window.
Center
An Align which centers its single child
Column
A Flex which arranges its children vertically
Config
Configuration object for the application containing the title, resolution and fullscreen flag
Constants
Holds constants accessible across the entire engine
Constraints
An immutable record for width and height range values
CrossAxisAlignment
Determines how children of a Flex parent are aligned along the cross axis
Decorated
A SingleChildParent which paints provides a shape, background color and border decorations
Empty
A Widget with zero size which renders nothing.
FixedSize
A SingleChildParent which enforces a fixed size on its child
Flex
A MultiChildParent which arranges its children linearly along one axis
Image
A Widget which renders a BufferedImage to the screen
ImageFit
Determines how the image should be resized/fitted in its bounds
Input
Input handles keyboard and mouse input detection for use in the application.
InputEvent
Abstract class representing UI events in the engine.
IntrinsicHeight
A SingleChildParent which limits the computed height of its single child to the child's intrinsic height
IntrinsicSize
A SingleChildParent which limits the computed size of its single child to the child's intrinsic size
IntrinsicWidth
A SingleChildParent which limits the computed width of its single child to the child's intrinsic width
IO
IO handles resource loading and file access.
MainAxisAlignment
Determines how children of a Flex parent are aligned along the main axis
Math
Provides commonly used math utility methods
MouseClickEvent
A MouseEvent which is dispatched when a mouse button is clicked on a listener widget
MouseClickEvent.Listener
Callback interface for a MouseClickEvent handler
MouseEnterEvent
A MouseEvent which is dispatched when the mouse just enters a listener widget
MouseEnterEvent.Listener
Callback interface for a MouseEnterEvent handler
MouseEvent
Abstract base class for mouse related events.
MouseExitEvent
A MouseEvent which is dispatched when the mouse just leaves a listener widget
MouseExitEvent.Listener
Callback interface for a MouseExitEvent handler
MouseMotionEvent
A MouseEvent which is dispatched when the mouse is moved over a listener widget
MouseMotionEvent.Listener
Callback interface for a MouseMotionEvent handler
MultiChildParent
A parent which contains multiple child Widgets
NinePatch
A SingleChildParent which uses the 9-patch algorithm to render a BufferedImage as a background to its descendants
Padding
A SingleChildParent which adds padding around its single child
Parent
A parent is a Widget which can contain one or more children.
Position
Represents an (x,y) position
Prop
Represents game objects within Scenes.
Renderer
Static class which provides draw methods to draw on the window scene.
Resolution
Represents the width and height the window at startup
Row
A Flex which arranges its children horizontally
Scene
A scene is a collection of props interacting with each other to form a logic part of your application.
SingleChildParent
A parent which contains only one child Widget
Spacing
Represents a padding or margin of a Widget
Stack
A MultiChildParent which stacks its children on top of each other
StateListener
Callback interface for Animation state changes
Task
Interface for an arbitrary task
Text
A Widget which renders text to the screen
TextAlignment
Determines the text alignment of a Text widget
Timeout
Timeout executes a specified Task after its duration has elapsed.
UI
UI manages the user interface within for Scene.
UI.WidgetTreeCreator
 
UI.WidgetTreeUpdater
 
ValueListener
Callback interface for Animation value changes
Widget
A widget is an abstract representation of a portion of a Scene's user interface.
Window
Window which manages the JFrame and image buffers the application is rendered in
